content: You need to have defeated the Feng-Tail General, Gold Armored Rhino, and Cloudtreading Deer before you can take on the Emerald-Armed Mantis. Look for the golden tree near where you saw the Feng-Tail General and Water-Wood Beast.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Emerald-Armed_Mantis.md', within the main section titled 'Emerald-Armed Mantis', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Emerald-Armed Mantis'.
The content is as follows:
You need to have defeated the Feng-Tail General, Gold Armored Rhino, and Cloudtreading Deer before you can take on the Emerald-Armed Mantis. Look for the golden tree near where you saw the Feng-Tail General and Water-Wood Beast.
